resources.string: To our Android project template, designed for instant kick-start of your next application! Our template provides everything you need for efficient project creation on the Android platform.

We have already added features such as Room and Retrofit to make it more convenient for you to connect your data sources. And also added a simple one!! to make it easy for you to implement your design.
Now even those who have paws can create an Android application!
Tap to read more about tech stack
